content: Spring Food Drive reached 1,200 families, distributed 4,500 lbs of food. Surplus used for future drives.
metadata: Ref: CAMP-101, final date: 2025-03-30, success metrics: 1,200 families served

content: Scholarship Fund supported 5 new students, 90% retention rate in first year. Additional $5k needed next semester.
Clean Water Initiative installed 2 new wells in rural area, benefiting 2,000 residents.
metadata: Ref: CAMP-103, final date: 2025-03-10, corporate match fully utilized

content: Community Health Fair served 300 attendees, performed 250 basic health screenings, referrals given.
Winter Coat Drive collected 600 coats, distributed to 4 local shelters. Additional storage needed.
